attributes.action: Have more Career Options paths shown to secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Teenagers taking their Gcses or taking career choices, doesnt seem to have enough chances to experience what different jobs there is in this world.
There should be a more ambitious program where children in secondary schools are shown videos/documentarys of these jobs and the downside and goodside ahead of them. This will aim more people to acheive their goals and have the right job suited for them.
